text: Crooked Streets is a 1920 American spy drama movie directed by Paul Powell and was based on the short story Dinner at Eight by Samuel Merwin. It stars Ethel Clayton, Jack Holt, Clyde Fillmore, Clarence Geldart, Joseph Crowell and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1920 drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American spy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Paul Powell
title: Crooked Streets
